# summary()

**Instance Method**

Generates a group summaries instance of the row grouping’s columns.

## Declaration

```swift
func summary() -> any GroupSummaries
```

## Summarizing a Row Grouping

- **summary(of:)**: Generates a group summaries instance of the row grouping’s columns you select by name.
- **GroupSummaries**: A collection of group summaries.
